eighteen treatises. The above are the catalog requested by the Venerable of Anxiang Temple.
The Imperial Record of the Tianli Era states:
On the twenty-ninth day of the eighth month in the third year of the Yinghe era,
Yuan Chao, the Minister of the Ministry of Education.
The court officials reported to the emperor that they had received a copy of the sutra list of Anxiang Temple.
The emperor asked whether this was rare or not.
It is feared that the above-mentioned list is the case.
The reason is that according to the record, it is not the handwriting of the master himself.
It should be recorded for future reference.
However, the current Vinaya master says that there may be a separate list, which should be sought.
